item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (533 points | 148 comments)
2. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (201 points | 76 comments)
3. My Dream Thermostat (9 points | discuss)
4. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (294 points | 293 comments)
5. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (66 points | 26 comments)
6. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (16 points | 4 comments)
7. iOS Kindle app now has a ‘get book’ button after changes to App Store rules (74 points | 41 comments)
8. Continue (YC S23) is hiring software engineers in San Francisco ( | hide)
9. Will Supercapacitors Come to AI's Rescue? (30 points | 29 comments)
10. The curse of knowing how, or; fixing everything (880 points | 378 comments)
11. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (158 points | 75 comments)
12. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (76 points | 37 comments)
13. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (192 points | 60 comments)
14. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (56 points | 10 comments)
15. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (422 points | 394 comments)
16. Preparing for when the machine stops (54 points | 31 comments)
17. Show HN: Sheet Music in Smart Glasses (124 points | 15 comments)
18. Sneakers (1992) – 4K makeover sourced from the original camera negative (343 points | 245 comments)
19. Scientists discover new way to convert corn waste to low-cost sugar for biofuel (22 points | 4 comments)
20. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (51 points | 25 comments)
21. Show HN: Feedsmith — Fast parser & generator for RSS, Atom, OPML feed namespaces (33 points | 4 comments)
22. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (246 points | 183 comments)
23. New studies offer insight into Lyme disease’s treatment, lingering symptoms (144 points | 75 comments)
24. Curl: We still have not seen a valid security report done with AI help (306 points | 155 comments)
25. Design and evaluation of a parrot-to-parrot video-calling system (2023) (123 points | 60 comments)
26. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (12 points | 3 comments)
27. GenAI-Accelerated TLA+ Challenge (27 points | 10 comments)
28. MTerrain: Optimized terrain system and editor for Godot (62 points | 5 comments)
29. The Inchtuthil Nail Hoard (61 points | 14 comments)
30. Propositions as Types (2014) [pdf] (92 points | 49 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
